text: hi everyone I did intend to film this
little message as a whole family but
sasha is quite upset about it and we
need to get this message out there it's
quite important so I'm just doing alone
it's about our fundraiser for the forest
fires here in Portugal it's in the
process of being deactivated today by
the GoFundMe websites and she wants to
explain to people what's going on with
their donations last night we found out
from a few people that they were getting
refunds from the go fund me website and
we didn't know why so we tried to log in
last night to find out what was going on
with that it comes down to a combination
of factors one of them is being reported
as fraudsters by some internet trolls
that we explained in a vlog a couple of
weeks back and also the second reason is
that we aren't be named beneficiaries
for the purpose of withdraw rules on the
website so with those two combinations
together as one the go fund me website
had red flags and now they're basically
sending out refunds automatically at
this point we've realized there's
nothing we can actually do about it it's
based on an algorithm it's an automated
system and half of the people have
already been refunded their donations
some of you probably already know this
because you had received an email from
going fund me saying that your donation
has been refunded without explanation
needless to say we're both extremely
embarrassed to be having to make this
video at all explaining this situation
we wanted to see it through to its end
and we feel like we failed in that
respect and it is not an ideal situation
however if you are still interested in
helping the victims of the Portuguese
forest fires here in Portugal there are
other ways to do it and during the
course of this fundraiser we've been in
talks with local people and with people
who have been affected by it and we can
recommend certain other fundraisers that
we didn't organize and put links for
those in the description of this video
so I think it's kind of important to
stress that we didn't organize these new
fundraisers that we're talking about
it's got nothing to do with us
whatsoever so if that was the reason why
the original fundraiser was flagged it's
got nothing to do with that the only
reason why we are
recommending these specific fundraisers
is because we personally didn't know at
least one person that is part of it and
that is the reason why we've chosen
those ones and not just something random
and put them down there so one more time
from us a huge sorry about this big miss
and please read the description below if
you want to divert your funds elsewhere
once you've received your refund most
likely by the end of today this
fundraiser will be completely
deactivated so if you haven't received a
refund already you will do by the end of
today oh this is managed to explain
outside of the story and the reason why
it hasn't worked out it's very
embarrassing for us but we just needed
to get the message out there so thanks
for listening
